item.title: Ease your way into new topics with a learning plan.
item.description: One of my goals for the second half of the year is to help as many people to get a grip on their learning goals for 2019.

item.title: An organizer's lessons on meet-ups and growing a community
item.description: Photo Credit:Christina Morillo Background When starting a community we usually have this long vision of seeing it evolve into a huge impactful part of the domain it belongs to.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a data analyst and content creator. I split my time between building data science projects in and out of work and creating content on this blog and my Youtube channel.

item.title: Writing your first Text Mining Script with R
item.description: Published in Towards Data Science Introduction One of the reasons data science has become popular is because of it’s ability to reveal so much information on large data sets in a split second or just a query.
